The new deal between the GOG and Kiciński includes the GOG.com storefront and the Galaxy platform. CDPR […]

items.title: Select users can score unlocked Galaxy Z Fold 7 w/ 2x storage at $720 off, but everyone can land one at $520 off
items.summary:
The Samsung holiday sale rolls on for a few more days, but we just spotted a deep deal on the JetBlack Galaxy Z Fold 7 over at Amazon. Some users are still seeing a gigantic targeted $720 off all colors by way of a cash discount combining with a FREE 2x storage offer direct from Samsung, and that is the best cash discount if you’re one of the lucky ones here. But anyone can land the black model at an impressive $520 off via Amazon today. 

more…

items.title: Enjoy a hot meal anywhere with East Oak’s cordless electric lunchbox at a new $90 low
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the best price yet on the East Oak Cordless Electric Lunch Box for $89.99 shipped. It’s coming down from $113 here, which we’ve only seen go as low as $100 with previous discounts. Now, you can score a larger-than-ever $23 markdown, landing it at a new all-time low price while also giving yourself an upgrade for your food needs.

more…

items.title: Navee’s latest XT5 Pro off-road superscooter with Apple Find My, proximity locking, more hits new $1,300 low (Save $200)
items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, Navee is offering its latest XT5 Pro Long-Range Off-Road Electric Scooter at $1,299.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page $300 off coupon, beating out its direct website pricing by $200. This is the newest ride from Navee that has been going for $1,500 since its release in early November, though it starts off higher from $1,600 at Amazon. Despite this higher starting rate, we’ve only seen one previous discount coming from its Amazon storefront, which dropped costs to $1,400 mid-December. Now, you can score an even larger $200 markdown off the going rate that lands it at a new all-time low price.

more…
